channel.title: Read this before posting!
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Please read this: Before posting anything in this section read the rules and all stickys to refrain from all the posts about item codes and moparscape. Read therealdjb's sticky at the top of the page to find out about :[/size]
[b]Private servers Item codes Moparscape[/b]
[i]So there will be no need for pointless posts anymore[/i].
Please do take this into account.
